Package net.sourceforge.reb4j

Regular Expression Builder for Java

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Alternative Interface indicating that an expression can be used as an alternative in an alternation.
Expression Basic abstraction of a regular expression.
Quantifiable Interface implemented by expressions that may have quantifiers applied to them without needing to first be wrapped in parentheses.
Sequenceable  
 

Class Summary
AbstractAlternative Abstract class providing the canonical implementation of Alternative.
AbstractExpression Base implementation of Expression.
AbstractQuantifiableSequenceableAlternative Extension to AbstractSequenceableAlternative providing the canonical implementation of Quantifiable.
AbstractSequenceableAlternative Extension to AbstractAlternative adding the canonical implementation of Sequenceable.
Adopted Expression constructed by "adopting" the expression string from an instance of Pattern.
Alternation Expression representing a set of alternatives that may be matched.
CharLiteral Expression that matches a single specific character.
Entity Class representing special pre-defined expressions.
Group Expression that has been grouped in parentheses.
Literal Expression that exactly matches a specific string or character.
Quantified Expression that has a quantifier attached to it.
Raw Base class for expressions that are readily combined with other similar expressions.
Raw.Compound Expression consisting of multiple
Raw.EscapedLiteral Adapter from Literal to Raw to facilitate merging literals.
Sequence Expression consisting of several sub-expressions that must be matched in series.
StringLiteral Expression that exactly matches a specific string.
 

Enum Summary
Flag Flag that can be passed to the Pattern regular expression engine.
 

Package net.sourceforge.reb4j Description

Regular Expression Builder for Java
